http:
  routers:
    unvr-router-http:
      rule: Host(`unvr.bourne.cloud`)
      service: unvr-service
    unvr-router-https:
      rule: Host(`unvr.bourne.cloud`)
      service: unvr-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    unvr-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "https://192.168.1.201"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
